title: Microsoft Office 2007 SP1 USB ThinApp - Word, Excel, PowerPoint
description:
Microsoft Office 2007 SP1 USB ThinApp - Word, Excel, PowerPoint
July 31, 2008

***Update of http://thepiratebay.se/tor/4165858/MS_Office_2007_SP1_Thinstall_Lite_-_Portable_USB_Ready


Description:
Portable, USB-ready builds of Office 2007 Excel, Powerpoint, and Word. This build is derived from
the Enterprise edition, meaning no activation is required - it&#039;s ready to run out of the box.
All unnecessary components that would be irrelevant in a portable environment have been stripped. 
Here is a partial list of what has been removed:

-Visual Basic for Applications
-Clip Organizer
-Picture Manager
-Microsoft Query
-Microsoft Script Editor
-NET Framework Programmability Support
-French, Spanish Proofing Components
-Document Imaging
-Sharepoint Services
-Document Update Utility

Installation Instructions:
Extract ALL files (to a USB drive). A new folder called "Office2007_ThinApp" will be created.

To Use:
Run the corresponding EXE file. First-time startup may take anywhere from a few seconds to a few
minutes, but subsequent launches should be significantly faster.

Technical Details:
Built with VMWare ThinApp 4.0 build 2200
Windows XP Pro SP3 on VMWare Workstation 6.0.4
